Text.Language: Ariv~meui~ P[oic m~piouro (m~piar,/) n~te penkahi pekbwk: a~reh e~rof qen ouhir/n/ nem oumeym/i nem oumetjwri.
Remember, O Lord, the king [leader] of our land, Your servant; keep him in peace, truth, and strength.
